# Pull Request Template

**Is this PR related to an issue?**

Please link the relevant issue here. For example: `Fixes #123` or `Closes #456`.

---

## Description

Provide a concise summary of the changes introduced in this pull request. Explain the problem this PR solves and the approach taken.

---

## Type of Change

*   [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
*   [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
*   [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
*   [ ] Documentation update
*   [ ] Refactoring
*   [ ] Chore
*   [ ] Other (please specify):

---

## Checklist

*   [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards and guidelines.
*   [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
*   [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
*   [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
*   [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
*   [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works.
*   [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
*   [ ] Any dependent components have been updated or are compatible.

---

## How to Test

Describe the steps to manually test the changes, if applicable. Be specific about any prerequisites or environment configurations.

---

## Additional Information

Provide any other information that may be helpful to the reviewer, such as screenshots, context, or potential impacts.
